images.description: Need to preview the image URL
images.description_zh: Need to preview the image URL

initial-index.description: Index from which the image preview starts
initial-index.description_zh: Index from which the image preview starts

closeable.description: Whether to show the close button
closeable.description_zh: Whether to show the close button

close-on-key-escape.description: Whether to support keyboard ESC to close the image-preview
close-on-key-escape.description_zh: Whether to support keyboard ESC to close the image-preview

teleport.description: The location of the pop-up layer to mount
teleport.description_zh: The location of the pop-up layer to mount

image-prevent-default.description: Whether to disable the default behavior of images
image-prevent-default.description_zh: Whether to disable the default behavior of images

events.name: change
events.description: The callback function when switching images, the callback parameter is the current index
events.description_zh: The callback function when switching images, the callback parameter is the current index

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered when Image-Preview is turned on
events.description_zh: Triggered when Image-Preview is turned on

events.name: opened
events.description: Triggered at the end of the open image-preview animation
events.description_zh: Triggered at the end of the open image-preview animation

events.name: closed
events.description: Triggered when the animation that closes the image-preview ends
events.description_zh: Triggered when the animation that closes the image-preview ends

events.name: long-press
events.description: The callback function when long pressing an image, the callback parameter is the current index
events.description_zh: The callback function when long pressing an image, the callback parameter is the current index
